name: This Is Not Enough Planet
description:
Why is your planet so small? You deserve more planet. Make it happen.

  • Twin stick flying and shooting: harvest asteroids and blow up the red stuff.
  • AI growth! Watch tiny workers expand your planet and grow hatcheries, towers, and trees full of health packs.
  • Shame your friends on cross platform leaderboards, powered by Dreamlo.
  • Created for Ludum Dare 38.
